thread.title: Islamic Finance Groups Aim to Expand into Mediterranean Region
thread.title_full: Islamic Finance Groups Aim to Expand into Mediterranean Region

title: Islamic Finance Groups Aim to Expand into Mediterranean Region
text:
Sunday 18, October 2015 by Matthew Amlôt 3rd Mediterranean Islamic Finance Forum to take place in Spain 
The General Council for Islamic Banks and Financial Institutions, the global umbrella of Islamic financial institutions, and the Association of the Mediterranean Chambers of Commerce and Industry (ASCAME) and the Chamber of Commerce of Barcelona are co-organising the 3 rd Mediterranean Islamic Finance Forum, themed “ Building Bridges ” on the 27 th of November 2015, at Casa Llotja de Mar in Barcelona, Spain.
